solution_line_template: If Sue has {sue_nuts} nuts, and Harry has twice as many nuts as Sue, Harry has {harry_multiplier_sue}*{sue_nuts} = {harry_nuts} nuts

Bill has {bill_multiplier_harry} times as many nuts as Harry, and since Harry has {harry_nuts} nuts, Bill has {harry_nuts}*{bill_multiplier_harry} = <<{bill_multiplier_harry}*{harry_nuts}={bill_nuts}>>{bill_nuts} nuts
Combined, Bill and Harry have {bill_nuts}+{harry_nuts} = <<{bill_nuts}+{harry_nuts}={combined_nuts}>>{combined_nuts} nuts
